<h3 id="X13887">X(13887)&nbsp;=&nbsp;HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: 3rd TRI-SQUARES-CENTRAL AND ANTI-MANDART-INCIRCLE</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; -a*(a^2-(b+c)*a-2*b*c)*S+2*a^3*b*c  :  :  <p>X(13887) lies on these lines: {1,6}, {3,8983}, {35,13888}, {55,3068}, {56,13902}, {100,8972}, {197,13889}, {371,11496}, {485,11500}, {590,1376}, {606,940}, {615,8167}, {1012,9583}, {1621,7585}, {3069,4423}, {3295,13883}, {3913,13911}, {4421,13846}, {5120,8225}, {5284,7586}, {5687,13893}, {6460,8273}, {7583,10267}, {8974,11497}, {8975,11498}, {8976,11499}, {8980,12178}, {8981,11248}, {8987,12330}, {8988,12331}, {8991,12335}, {8992,12338}, {8993,12339}, {8994,12327}, {8995,12341}, {8997,13173}, {8998,13204}, {9540,10310}, {10306,13912}, {11108,13936}, {11383,13884}, {11490,13885}, {11491,13886}, {11492,13890}, {11493,13891}, {11494,13892}, {11501,13897}, {11502,13898}, {11504,13900}, {11507,13904}, {11508,13905}, {11509,13906}, {11510,13907}, {11848,13894}, {11849,13903}, {12326,13908}, {12328,13909}, {12329,13910}, {12332,13913}, {12334,13915}, {12336,13916}, {12337,13917}, {12340,13918}, {12342,13919}, {12343,13921}, {12344,13879}, {13205,13922}, {13206,13923}, {13795,13848}</p>
